lead_paragraph: An article on Aug. 23 about the Chinese men’s Olympic field hockey team misidentified the individual who is known as Wei Wei. It is the player named Meng Lizhi — not his mother, Au Sutao.
snippet: An article on Aug. 23 about the Chinese men’s Olympic field hockey team misidentified the individual who is known as Wei Wei. It is the player named Meng Lizhi — not his mother, Au Sutao.
